properties.entry: SELECT m.MEM_ID AS "MEM_ID", m.NICKNAME AS "NICKNAME", b.BLOCK_TYPE AS "BLOCK_TYPE", b.BLOCK_COUNT AS "BLOCK_COUNT", r.MEM_ID "REPORT_ID", b.BLOCK_DATE "BLOCK_DATE" FROM MEMBER_BLACKLIST b JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO JOIN MEMBER r ON b.REPORTMEM_NO = r.MEM_NO ORDER BY b.BLOCK_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(MEM_NO) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ENROLL_DATE) = ? AND STATUS != 'N'
SELECT ITEM_NUM , CATEGORYNAME , ITEM_NAME , PRICE , ITEM_INTRO , ITEM_DATE , ITEM_STATUS FROM ITEM JOIN ITEMCATEGORY USING(ITEM_CATEGORY) WHERE ITEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ITEM_NUM DESC
